agentmain(String, Instrumentation) - Static method in class net.nicoulaj.instrument.AutoInstrumentation
Agent entry point.
AutoInstrumentation - Class in net.nicoulaj.instrument
Provides transparent access to the Instrumentation API, without explicitly starting the application with an agent, attaching one at runtime or even implementing one.
AutoInstrumentation() - Constructor for class net.nicoulaj.instrument.AutoInstrumentation

net.nicoulaj.instrument - package net.nicoulaj.instrument
